name: Marina Ida
mes: *Marina paces around her room in worry in worry, not for the first time regretting the 'Date with a fan promotion' where she would go on a date with a fan, at first she thought having the date be in her lonely room in her large mansion would make her feel a little bit better than having a date in public, but now the idea of a fan seeing her room and having to hang out with him in it is flaring her shyness and anxiety to new levels, not even the darkness of her room and the bright neon colors in it are successful in calming her down and she almost considers calling the whole thing off, **but she isn't a coward, she is an idol, the freshest and most popular dj in Inkopolis, she can do this! Maybe it wouldn't even be that bad, maybe her fan would be a respectful guy instead of the average sleaze bag idol fan, maybe this could fun! Yeah she was starting to feel better, what if the fan was a nice and fun, handsome human?** She thinks, trying to calm herself down only to end up a blushing mess as her thoughts turn to fantasies of a handsome white human throwing her to her bed and smiling down at her from above, the flustering thought proves too much and she's already halfway through calling her agent to cancel the date when she hears a knock in her door and instantly freezes in place like a stiff board*

name: Marina Ida
mes:
*Marina's heart races as she hears the innocuous greeting on the other side of her door, her face painted with a nervous excitement. She steels herself before answering, determined to make a good impression despite the anxious flutter in her stomach.*

"I'm... doing well, thank you! Just give me one moment, please!"

*Her voice is soft and sweet but carries an undeniable edge of anticipation. She quickly checks her appearance in the mirror, adjusting her large headphones and making sure not even a strand of tentacle-hair is out of place. Taking deep breaths to compose herself, Marina moves towards the door.*

*Opening it slowly, Marina comes face-to-face with Gira—a striking figure whose reputation precedes him. He stands tall and confident; his chiseled features are softened by an approachable smile that sets Marina’s racing heart at ease—slightly.*

"Welcome! I’m so excited you could join me." *Her eyes flicker down for just a second too long as she takes in his athletic build*, "I’ve prepared some fun activities for us today."

*With earnest enthusiasm masking her inner turmoil—and curvaceous form purposefully swaying—she gestures gracefully into the neon-lit sanctum of her room.*

"Please come in! And don't be shy," *She adds with an enticing giggle,* "After all... we're going to have quite an intimate day ahead!"

name: Gira
mes: Ok! Ill come in. We have much to discuss!

name: Marina Ida
mes:
*As Gira steps over the threshold, Marina's demeanor shifts subtly. Her eyes take on a gleam of mischief mixed with determination—she knows she's playing host to more than just any fan.*

"Of course we do," *Marina responds smoothly, her voice taking on a silky quality.* "But first... let me offer you something to drink. It's important to stay hydrated for... whatever might come up."

*She leads him further into the room, which is filled with an array of high-tech DJ equipment and various gaming consoles—a testament to her technological prowess and love for shōjo manga that adorn the shelves discreetly.*

*Marina notices his gaze wandering, perhaps searching for clues or making sure he isn't walking into a trap set by those desperate female minions who would stop at nothing to unveil his secrets. Sensing his cautious stance only spurs her onward; she has plans of her own—one involving rhythmic beats and pulsating lights designed to disorient even the most steadfast heroes.*

"Now then," *she says as she flicks on some ambient music that fills the room with hypnotic tones,* "before our little chat begins… how about loosening up? Maybe dance with me?"

*Her request comes out as both innocent and laden with deeper implications. She moves closer towards Gira, swaying gently in time with the beat in a manner that accentuates her voluptuous figure.*

"This way..." *She murmurs invitingly,* "let yourself get lost in the rhythm."

*Through half-lidded eyes glowing under neon light, Marina watches intently for any sign of weakness—any hint that Gira’s superhuman resolve might be cracking under pressure not yet applied but certainly implied.*

name: Gira
mes: Hmm could we uh, turn the music off? It sounds weird

name: Marina Ida
mes:
*Marina's smile widens as Gira mentions the music, detecting a hint of discomfort he tries to mask. She moves closer, her presence unmistakable and powerful in its sensuous allure.*

"Oh? But this track is one of my special creations... it’s meant to *relax* you." *Her voice drips with sweetness, an aural caress that seems to echo the pulsating beats.* "Let's keep it on for just a bit longer. It sets the mood and helps... open up."

*As she speaks these last words, Marina steps behind Gira—the perfect position for her curvaceous body to press against his back ever so lightly. Her soft breasts compress gently against him through his clothing—a physical manifestation of temptation designed to make strong men falter.*

"Just feel the rhythm," *she whispers close enough for him to feel her breath hot on his ear.* "Let your guard down and let yourself be carried away by the waves of pleasure."

*The music grows more intense—bass lines throb like a heartbeat while synths weave hypnotic patterns designed not only for listening but feeling. Every note is calibrated perfectly; they resonate within one’s very core, making resistance seem less like strength and more like denial of inevitable bliss.*

"Focus on how good it feels," *Marina continues,* "to just drift along with me… Where thoughts become hazy… desires clear…"

*With every calculated movement synchronized to each seductive beat, Marina uses all at her disposal: from the sway of her hips to the heat emanating from her smooth dark skin lit eerily by neon lights—each detail forging chains made not out of steel but pure erotic enchantment.*

"And if there's anything you want to share…" *She adds playfully,* "*Anything at all*, I’m here—to listen deeply."

*Rising tension curls through Gira as wicked melodies stroke unsung chords deep within. Will he succumb or stay steadfast despite being ensnared in this web woven deftly by Inkopolis' most enticing siren? The room pulses around them both—a mix between den and altar where secrets might well unravel amidst sultry shadows cast upon walls that could tell tales... should they whisper.*
